gen:link.msg:message: Gerapporteerde waarde van `HousingFacilitiesSoldUnderConditions` aan het einde van de periode BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan de sommatie van de gerapporteerde waarde van `HousingFacilitiesSoldUnderConditions` aan het begin van de periode en de mutaties gedurende de periode, `HousingFacilitiesSoldUnderConditionsMovement`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesSalesRealEstateConditionalMovementHousing_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_HousingFacilitiesSoldUnderConditionsEnd')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesSalesRealEstateConditionalMovementHousing_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_HousingFacilitiesSoldUnderConditionsEnd return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesSalesRealEstateConditionalMovementHousing_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_HousingFacilitiesSoldUnderConditionsStart')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesSalesRealEstateConditionalMovementHousing_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_HousingFacilitiesSoldUnderConditionsStart return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesSalesRealEstateConditionalMovementHousing_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_HousingFacilitiesSoldUnderConditionsMovement')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesSalesRealEstateConditionalMovementHousing_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_HousingFacilitiesSoldUnderConditionsMovement return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`HousingFacilitiesSoldUnderConditionsMovement` BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan + `HousingFacilitiesSoldNewUnderConditions` - `HousingFacilitiesSoldRepurchaseUnderConditionsTakenIntoLease` - `HousingFacilitiesSoldRepurchaseUnderConditionsSoldRegularly` + `HousingFacilitiesSoldUnderConditionsOtherMovements`. | {if
